<letter id="jhr3903">
<recipient first="PAT." last="TONYN." type="individual"/>
<p>
<a href='/results.php?city=st. augustine' rel='city origin'>ST. AUGUSTINE</a>, <a rel="month origin" value="2">February</a> <a rel='day origin' value='20'>20</a>, <a href='/results.php?year=1777' rel="origin">1777</a>. 
</p><p>
SIR : A sense of duty and humanity for the people at large, induces 
me to transmit to you the enclosed Proclamation and intelligence for 
their information, and I doubt not in justice to them, you will make as 
public as possible. 
</p><p>
I am, sir, your most obedient and humble servant, 
</p><p>
PAT. TONYN. 
</p><p>
JOHN RUTLEDGE, ESQ. 
</p>
</letter>
